desc:
Sometime you asked us for a new icon, a successor to Atom for the new times. The day has arrived. We present Atom California, the most versatile sneaker in the history of Muroexe.
A clean and sober design, according to current trends, but with our minimalist and technical soul. It is the "All in one" sneaker. Not only fits perfect with a suit, but it is also designed so that you have a great style in a dress or with jeans. Versatile and decisive, like Meryl Streep or Denzel Washington.
Materials: >Microfibre >Mesh >Rubber sole
